summary: Quick reflexes perk tweaked so that you can decide whether to slow down time or not when facing a powerattack.
descriptionHtml:
What does this mod do? 

This mod modifies how the \'quick reflexes\' perk is triggered. You still need to wait for an opponent to start a powerattack, but now simply pressing the block button will not trigger the slow time effect. 

You need to press the block button AND stay still. This means that if you\'re blocking but also moving in some direction (forward, backwards, to the sides...) the perk won\'t trigger. If you block and also don\'t press any directional key, then the perk will trigger (if the enemy is powerattacking of course). 

Why the change?

After getting the \'quick reflexes\' perk I realized that even though it was a nice move, the perk triggered much more often than I wanted. The OPTION to slow down time and stylishly evade a powerattack was very cool, but using it against every single powerattack felt cheap. That\'s why I thought: when facing a powerattack, it would be good to be able to decide if I want to use quick reflexes or not. And from this idea, this mod was born. 

How to install: 

Simply drop the \'QRtweak.esp\' in your data folder. 

How to uninstall: 

Simply delete the \'QRtweak.esp\' from your data folder. 

Programs used: 

SkyEdit v0.041a
